column4: You know how when you move your mouse to the corner of the screen and all the windows arrange them selves neatly for you to select one, What is that called?  And how do you enable it?
here on my OpenSUSE, it's called "Scale: initiate window picker"
Ubuntu 9.10 has composing including, you don't have to go install compiz yourself.  But I don't know how to change the settings
yep, that what I wanted, thanks
